Class SecurityConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
org.radarbase.management.config.SecurityConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:

@Configuration @EnableWebSecurity @EnableGlobalMethodSecurity(prePostEnabled=true, securedEnabled=true) public class SecurityConfiguration extends org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
